---
title: "DAR report"
output:
    html_document:
        toc: true
params:
    dar_file: "dars.tsv"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

# Read in output file

```{r}
dars <- read_tsv(params$dar_file) %>%
    arrange(accession)
nrow(dars)
```

# New DARs

```{r}
tmp <- dars %>%
    filter(is.na(DAR))
nrow(tmp)
tmp %>% kable()
```

# DARs with a COL modifier

```{r}
tmp <- dars %>%
    filter(str_detect(consent_group, "COL"))
nrow(tmp)
tmp %>% kable()
```

# Existing DARs

```{r}
tmp <- dars %>%
    filter(!is.na(DAR))
nrow(tmp)
tmp %>% kable()
```

# Dates

## Request date

```{r}
ggplot(dars, aes(request_date)) +
    geom_histogram()
```

## Renewal date

```{r}
ggplot(dars, aes(last_renewal_date)) +
    geom_histogram()
```
